ConceptDef.label: ﹝AWA﹞ Welcome !
ConceptDef.helpText: Welcome to Automatic Work Assignment mod ! We have prepared a few set of basic work specifications, but they do nothing for now. Open the mod's window to get started.

ConceptDef.label: ﹝AWA﹞ Work manager editor
ConceptDef.helpText: You can overview the work specifications we've set-up for you. Each assignment can be paused, alert if unsatisfied, moved or removed, and show the actual/desired assigned pawns. Select one of them to see its details.

ConceptDef.label: ﹝AWA﹞ Work specifications details
ConceptDef.helpText: Each work specifications has 5 sections: The fullfilment options defines how many pawns you want assigned to this work specifications. This is what you'll typically see in the work specifications list on the left. The jobs lists which jobs should be assigned to pawns of this work specifications The fitness is used to calculate a fitness scores for each pawn. Pawns with the higher fitness will be picked first, until the desired number of pawns are assigned. The conditions filters pawns based on true/false filters, such as passions, skill level, weapon equipped, etc The assigment actions will do some actions on assigned pawn, such as setting a schedule, an allowed area, adding a bill to it (with Automatic Surgeries plugin), etc.
